short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly convert your Figma designs into Bubble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Figma to Bubble: Design to Web in Seconds

Transform your Figma designs into Bubble web apps effortlessly. This extension bridges the gap between design and development, allowing Bubble users to quickly convert Figma layouts into functional web elements. Streamline your workflow and bring your designs to life with just a few clicks.
